main_definition: Leading refers to being in the forefront, guiding or directing a group of people or things towards a specific goal or direction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Being at the head or foremost position
meanings_and_examples.example: She was leading her team in their efforts to complete the project on time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Guiding or directing a group towards a common goal
meanings_and_examples.example: The experienced manager is known for his ability to lead and motivate his employees effectively.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Taking the initiative in an activity, often leading others
meanings_and_examples.example: He took on the role of leading our community service project by coordinating volunteers and resources.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Being first or ahead in a competition or ranking
meanings_and_examples.example: Their company has been consistently leading the market share for years, outpacing their competitors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A position of prominence or influence in society
meanings_and_examples.example: She held a prominent leading role as an environmental activist and influencer worldwide.
